abstract.p: E*Trade Group says it earned $5.7 million in its third quarter, compared with loss of $21.8 million in year-earlier period; says net revenue was $330.3 million, up 77 percent from $186.4 million last year (S)

block.p: The E*Trade Group, the second-largest Internet brokerage, said it earned $5.7 million, or 2 cents a share, in its third quarter, compared with a loss of $21.8 million, or 8 cents, in the comparable period last year. E*Trade, based in Menlo Park, Calif., said its third-quarter net revenue was $330.3 million, up 77 percent from $186.4 million last year. Analysts had expected the company to lose a penny a share, according to First Call/Thomson Financial.

Analysts had expected the company to lose a penny a share, according to First Call/Thomson Financial.
